Golden Child

Introduction

Kim Donghyun is a South Korean dancer and singer under Woollim Entertainment. He debuted as a member of the boy group Golden Child on August 28, 2017.

On December 27th, Woolim took to Weverse to announce that the exclusive contracts of Golden Child members Lee Daeyeol, Y, Bae Seungmin, Bong Jaehyun and Kim Donghyun will come to an end on December 31st.
